TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. WW2 never happens, and rocketry is set back 100 years or so. Bye bye satellite communication and navigation.

I wish for smooth sailing.

Granted, but no level is completely smooth, and you get shrunk down to almost the size of an atom.

I wish for spectator mode and noclip after death.

Granted, but you only have one life, and cannot leave the game.

I wish GTA V PC would STOP BEING DELAYED!!!!

Granted, but Rockstar Games shuts down and don't release heists, also the PC port will be terrible.

I wish government wasn't corrupt

Granted, but it sucks because of the quick release.

I wish for hamsters eating the universe.

granted. but you are eaten too.

I wish for a world made of cake

Granted. but the its poop cake.

I wish my wish will be corrupted

Granted, ERROR 404, CANNOT PROCEED.

I wish I could have a better computer.

Granted. but I eat it.

I wish I can eat ununoctium

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ununoctium

Granted. It is HAL 9000. Ninja'd

Granted. But it is *all* you can eat, so you rapidly starve to death.

I wish for more sci-fi movies of 2001: A Space Odyssey quality.

Granted. They have high quality but they are all in mandarin chinese. No subtitles.

I wish wo shuo zhongwen

Granted, but you can only see them on gliese 581 c

I wish i have wished that i wished that my wish will be corrupted

- - - Updated - - -

Granted, but after 1 second you can only speak chinese.

I wish I'm swimming in a lake on Titan

Granted. People will be surprised by the skeleton that they'll find years later.

I wish for a very big tomato.

Granted. Big is a relative term. It is absolutely enormous... to a grain of salt.

I order wish could things I properly.

Proper order as said Yoda is. Granted, your wish is.

I wish there was no Hayden Christensen in Star Wars.

Granted. The part went to Pauly Shore instead.

I wish the spark plugs in my car were easier to get to.

granted. they fly straight to you.

I wish that the sun will not die.

Granted, but all life ends on Earth anyway because of a nuclear war.

I wish I could go to Freddy Fazbear's Pizzarea during daytime.

Granted, but their pizza sucks.

I wish for better internet at my school.

Granted. You get better and more "interesting" viruses, too.

I wish I didn't have heartburn.

Granted. You have headaches instead.

I wish I could actually write music. All I do is arrange...

Granted, but music gets less and less popular and no one listens to your music. (That was almost too horribly corrupted...)

I wish for more snowy winters here in Sweden.

No... you really don't. The snow grows to 10 ft tall and starts to cause casualties.

I wish for shorter winters here in Michigan.

Granted, but the shorter winters are caused by the greenhouse effect, and several countries and cities are flooded, just because of your wish.

I wish for longer weekends.

granted, but you can't do fun things in your longer weekend.

I wish I can travel faster than light
